item.title: Regular rubbish burning in back garden, 3rd August
item.description:
There has been regular trash burning ( every weekend) in the back garden of 195 or 193 rotherhite new road, I'm not sure which one. I believe it to be 195 as I checked with the Lions Den Chicken grill who share a wall and they indicated it was coming from nextdoor. The fire brigade has been called out a few times due to smoke but they never realised it was coming from a back garden. The smoke has caused me issues with my asthma, and I would really appreciate this being looked into.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 193, Rotherhithe New Road, Bermondsey, London
Report on FixMyStreet
